screen.edge_blending_tip: Blend together multiple outputs/projectors for a more seamless transition
screen.cropping_tip: Fine adjust the window content position by cropping the sides

about.more: Please check out more of our applications at
about.report: To report an issue or request a feature, go to
about.translate: Want to help translate? Please head over to
about.support: If you are grateful for this project, please consider supporting it
about.download: Restart the application to update, or go to freeshow.app to download manually

tooltip.project: Create a new project where you can add and arrange shows.
tooltip.show: Create a new show where you can add song lyrics, presentations and media.
tooltip.groups: All the groups in the current show and all the global groups. Click or drag them to add them to the current layout.
tooltip.layout: Add transitions and next timers to slides in current layout.
tooltip.media: All media in current show. Show them, or drag them to current layout.
tooltip.text: Edit the content of all selected items.
tooltip.filters: Change the look of the selected element.
tooltip.scripture: Hold Ctrl/Cmd or Shift to select multiple verses.

tips.trigger: Triggers are commonly used to send a HTTP request to change the preset of cameras.

setup.good_luck: I hope you find this software useful. Good luck showing! :)
setup.tips: Find handy tips and tutorials on the website.
setup.change_later: You can change these settings later

create_show.search_web: Search for song on the web
create_show.format_new_show_tip: Improve text format with auto capitalize, trim/split text & more.
create_show.split_lines_tip: Numbers of lines allowed per slide before auto splitting
create_show.quick_lyrics_example_tip: Enter lyrics or any text here
create_show.exists: Found an existing show with the same name

media.bundle_media_files_tip: Copy the media files from all shows into one folder

audio.allow_gaining_tip: Allow setting volume above 100% (May cause distortion)

empty.recording: Right click a screen or window to start a recording.

error.bible_api: Could not load scripture from API.Bible, do you have an internet connection?
error.display: Could not show output window on current display
error.keep_one_layout: You have to have at least one layout
error.video_unavailable: Getting video unavailable? The creator has disabled embeds on the video.
error.uri: Could not parse the audio name, please rename the file
error.ip: Could not get the IP-address of your device, go to the computer Wi-Fi settings to find your local IPv4 address.

category.action_tip: An action that triggers each time a show with this category is presented.

popup.delete_show_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete
popup.unsaved: Are you sure you want to quit?
popup.reset_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset everything?
popup.reset_all_action: This will reset the whole program, but not delete the .show files in your "Shows"-folder.

toast.chapter_undefined: Chapter {} does not exist in this book.
toast.verse_undefined: Verse {} does not exist in this chapter.
toast.template_applied_globally: This template is already applied to the show globally.
toast.reverting_setting: Reverting this change in {} seconds, enable again to make the change stay!
toast.reverted: Setting reverted! Only enable again if you did not have any problems.
toast.media_replaced: Missing media file replaced with match.
toast.one_output: You have to have at least one active output!
toast.output_capture_enabled: Output screen capture enabled, this may cause performance issues. Only use if needed!
toast.midi_no_project: Received trigger to change project, but no project found at index:
toast.midi_no_show: Received trigger to start slide, but no show active.
toast.midi_no_slide: Received trigger to start slide, but no slide found at index:
toast.midi_no_velocity: Received MIDI signal, but no velocity, defaults to first index.

show.name: Name
show.locked_info: This show has been locked for editing. Unlock it again in the shows drawer.

actions.project_template_tip: Create a new project from this template
actions.chord_info: Please click any letter to add a chord.
actions.press_to_assign: Press any letter key to assign
actions.play_on_midi_tip: Activate this specific slide when receiving chosen MIDI signal
actions.delete_shows_not_indexed: Delete shows in 'Shows' folder that are not indexed
actions.toggle_checkbox_tip: Action will toggle if checkbox is unchanged
actions.activate_audio_playlist_ended: Activate when audio playlist has ended

conditions.all_conditions: All of the following conditions are met
conditions.some_conditions: Some of the following conditions are met
conditions.none_conditions: None of the following conditions are met

recording.tip: Record and replay the timings of slides. Sync with an audio track on the first slide.
recording.layout_changed: Layout has changed since last recording!
recording.use_duration_tip: Use duration time instead of timestamp time

cloud.info: Sync files with Google Drive for backups, or if you work on multiple computers.
cloud.tip_api: You have to provide your own free Google API key so the program can automatically upload files to your Google Drive.
cloud.tip_how: Don't know how to get one?
cloud.enable: Automatic sync on startup and close
cloud.choose_method_tip: There is existing data in the cloud. Please choose to either upload from local or download from cloud. The other location will be overwritten.

export.option_type: What would you like to export?
export.title: Title

captions.info: Please click the URL to open in your browser if you haven't already, or open it on any other device! Make sure to give access to your microphone, and use Google Chrome for the best performance.

midi.name: Name
midi.auto_values: Update values when receiving a MIDI input
midi.tip_action: To activate specific slides, right click any slide and choose the midi in action.
midi.tip_index_by_velocity: Index is determined by the received velocity, starting at 0.

emitters.tip: Create emit templates to easily send specific messages.

settings.styles_hint: Create different styles that can be applied to the output to change the look.
settings.outputs_hint: Create multiple output windows, position them on external screens, or send a screen capture.
settings.hide_output_hint: Double click on the output window to hide it. Hold CTRL to enable dragging.
settings.hide_menubar_hint: To hide the menu bar, enable kiosk mode, or enable "Automatically hide or show the menu bar" in the general MacOS settings.
settings.output_locked: The output position has been locked!
settings.show_output_hint: Hold ctrl/cmd while clicking the display button to force it to show over this monitor.
settings.move_output_hint: Don't find your display? Change the position until the window shows up on the second screen.
settings.select_display: Click on the screen where you want to display the output window.
settings.manual_input_hint: Can't find the display? Click here to manually change the position.
settings.manual_drag_hint: You can also hold ctrl/cmd over an active output window to manually drag it around.
settings.overrided_value: A template might override this value
settings.alert_updates: Alert when a new update is available
settings.auto_shortcut_first_letter: Auto shortcut to first letter in text
settings.startup_projects_list: Show the projects list on startup
settings.clear_style_background_on_text: Clear style background when slide is active
settings.user_data_exists: Found existing data at custom location, would you like to overwrite it?
settings.restart_for_change: You have to restart the program for the change to take effect!
settings.connect: Connect by typing this in a web browser
settings.section_trigger_action: Trigger action when navigating presentation to a section

presentation_control.unsupported_tip: You can convert them to images and create a show, or turn off 'Always on top' to present from any other app.

guide_description.start: This is a short walkthrough of some basic features! (You can skip in the bottom right corner.)
guide_description.project_manage: Manage all of your projects in one place.
guide_description.project_create: Create folders to keep it organized, and create new projects.
guide_description.project_list: After opening a project you get a list of all the items here on the left side, drag & drop from the drawer to add more.
guide_description.drawer: Find all of your shows, media, overlays, etc. in one place.
guide_description.drawer_search: Search for content in the active drawer tab (songs, etc.). Use the shortcut CTRL/CMD+F for quicker access.
guide_description.drawer_shows: Manage all of your different shows by organizing them in different categories. Drag & drop any selected show to move them.
guide_description.create_show_button: Click this to create a new show (song, presentation, etc.)
guide_description.create_show_popup: Fill in the main details of the show, you can also auto find lyrics on the web from the name, or paste the lyrics manually.
guide_description.show: A show is the main presentation, click on any slide to present, and use the arrow keys to navigate. You can also drag & drop media files on a slide to set as background.
guide_description.media: You can add media content with drag and drop, from the drawer or from your computer, into a show or a project.
guide_description.show_slide: After a slide is clicked, it will show in the output and you will see a preview on the right, here you'll also find some extra actions like pausing a video.
guide_description.output_window: Click this button to open an output window on a secondary screen.
guide_description.output_clear: Clear individual output layers, or clear all layers in the output.
guide_description.edit: Open slide editing with one click at the top.
guide_description.end: Feel free to look on the web if you need help with other features.

songbeamer_import.translation_description_multiline: Adds all languages in a single textbox in alternating lines. (Like in Songbeamer)
songbeamer_import.translation_description_textboxes: Adds every language as a separate textbox to the slide.
songbeamer_import.translation_description_layouts: Creates a unique set of slides and a layout for every language.
